TopicTitle: Mk3 replica shuttle building and flying guide (video)

Articles.Content:
I've just finished making a couple of guide videos showing how to build and fly a replica space shuttle using only stock parts. I thought I would share it.

Download link for finished ship is - [https://www.dropbox.com/s/v3cq5h7jml4kd4u/Shuttle%20mk3-e.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/v3cq5h7jml4kd4u/Shuttle%20mk3-e.craft?dl=0)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/T5QMC6TRHBQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Z6I9Gw9gNlk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Part one is excellent! I'm saving part 2 for my lunch break tomorrow.

Good stuff.
